pages.text: "An advanced upgradable pump, capable of extracting any type of fluid."$(p)The Electric Pump can physically extract any fluids using power. Water is a unique case in that, by default, it will not get physically extracted. In other words, the Electrical Pump can continuously pump out buckets

of water from a single water source. The Electrical Pump's range is configurable, but by default it is set to 80 blocks. $(p)As of Mekanism V10.0.21, the Electrical Pump with 6, 7, and 8 $(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_speed)Speed Upgrades$(/l) extracts at the same speed (1,000mB/t). Thus, adding more than 6 speed upgrades is a waste and needlessly uses more power.
